name: ColorFlight
description:
Let's explore the colorful space!

Panels can only pass through the same color as the body. Let's navigate well and proceed to space ahead.

The score goes up every time you break through the panel. There is also a point on the panel where you can earn additional scores, so let's hit the stars.

You will be able to enter the invincible mode by passing five stars and you will be able to win the perfect on all the panels.

Since the speed of the body rises as you go further, you will need a more advanced operating technique. Please aim for a higher score and
space ahead!
